item.title: Sticking with the existing projects!
item.description:
I decided that instead of making a whole new website, I stick with something that many people have access to—a program called Jekyll.

It’s really useful for starting up a blog quickly. Luckily, Jekyll doesn’t use any dynamic webpages, so it can be hosted anywhere that accepts HTML pages.

Unfortunately, I also want to make money, and a way that I had planned was to use a URL shortener to their webservers, much like adf.ly. But until I get used to this Jekyll, all links linked are going to be direct.

Feel free to donate here
